name: Fluid Contortionist
summary: You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze.
description:
You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze. When you roll a critical failure on a check to Squeeze, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Undine: Undines are planar scions descended from marids.
